Overview Specifications
This Crathco D15-4 single bowl 5 gallon refrigerated beverage dispenser is a simple and effective way to boost impulse sales at your snack bar, buffet, or fast food restaurant. Has plastic side panels and drip tray. This single bowl premix cold beverage dispenser is as easy to clean as any in the industry! With fewer parts for a fast, easy cleanup, this dispenser makes it easier than ever to give your fruit juice, iced tea, and iced coffee the exposure they deserve. The D15-4 refrigerated beverage dispenser's 1/6 hp compressor uses R134A refrigerant that will keep your beverages chilled and ready for consumption for hours at a time. It requires a 120V electrical connection and is UL and NSF Listed.
